page.title: 14Chiltern Hall
page.content: When I got to Chiltern Hall I thought it was just a pile of stones and wood, but then I thought in a few years time it would fall down and would be forgotten. There is no glass in the windows and in some rooms it has no floor. There are not any stairs and there are lots of holes in the roof and walls. It used to be a farmhouse, it has been vandalised as well. You can tell it has been vandalised because the doors are off. The doors havent been taken away,they are just lying on the floor. In the corridor there are lots of bricks, floorboards and plaster from the roof. It is so deep you can hardly move from room to room.
